posts.title: Wolf's First Post
posts.text: That's 30 minutes away. I'll be there in 10.

posts.title: Wolf's Second Post
posts.text: I'm Winston Wolf. I solve problems.

posts.title: Wolfs's third Post
posts.text: Just because you have character doesn't mean you have character.

posts.title: Butch's first Post
posts.text: That's how you're gonna beat em, Butch. They keep underestimating you
